entry.title: Weeders (One unit - Random selection)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Accessories
Price: 2.55

These weeders are heavy enough to get a good feel and their sharp ends make it easy to get even the tinier pieces out.  

This listing is for one weeder.  It will be randomly selected from the various available models.  They all work equally well.

entry.title: Pressing Pillows
entry.summary:

Type: Pressing Pillows
Price: 51.00

QUANTITIES ARE LIMITED - First come, first served

You receive a bundle of 5 pillows in the following sizes:

- 21 x 5 1/2 inches

- 10 1/2 x 4 1/4 inches

- 19 1/2 by 12 1/2 inches

- 6 by 6 inches

- 10 by 10 inches

entry.title: Heat Transfer Pressing Paper / Multipurpose
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Accessories
Price: 3.19

This heat transfer paper works beautifully with your heat press.  You don't have a teflon sheet, no need to buy one, this paper will do the job.  Use the glossy side on the garment when pressing.  You can reuse the sheet over and over.

Sheets measure 16"x20 and will be folded in half for shipping purposes.  All you need to do is put it in your press to remove the crease!

The glossy side of the paper can also be used to store weeded transfers until you are ready for heat application.

entry.title: HTV Thermo-Tape
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type:
Price: 14.88

3/8" by 72 yards

Thermo-Tape keeps your designs in place.

Use this heat resistant tape to keep graphics and lettering in place before and during heat press application.

Detailed instructions provided on package.  Note that this tape should be used to tack pieces in place for 2 seconds and then removed.

entry.title: SISER HTV Colour Guide
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: SISER HTV Colour Guide
Price: 11.48

Siser Heat Transfer Materials Color Guide

New 2019 edition!  The Siser product selector guide is a tri-fold color chart which displays actual product samples and colors.  The Siser color guide is great for showing color choices to potential customers or for personal reference.  The following Siser products are represented in the guide:

Siser EasyWeed
Siser EasyWeed Extra
Siser Easyweed Stretch
Siser EasyWeed Electric
Siser EasyWeed Foil
Siser VideoFlex Glitter
Siser StripFlock
Siser Holographic
Siser Glitter
Siser EasyWeed Sub Block
Siser Brick (printed color representations only)

Please this book may be gently rolled in your box depending on the size of your order.  It will flatten out quicker if you set a couple of heavy books on it overnight.

entry.title: TTD Easy Mask (Transfer Product for Patterned HTV)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Mask
Price: 0.88 - 3.15 (3 variants)

Contrary to regular HTV, patterned HTV doesn't have a carrier sheet.  This product is what is used as your carrier.  Please refer to the Patterned HTV product for application instructions (link below).  Each sheet measures approximately 10 1/2 by 12 inches. 

https://scriptdesigns.myshopify.com/collections/patterned-heat-transfer-vinyl-htv
